name: ResidentPortal-Entratamation
0:
”Alexa, turn on Living Room”
”Alexa, turn off Living Room”
”Alexa, set Thermostat to 75 degrees”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Voice control of your smart home is now possible! Speak commands to your locks, lights, thermostats, outlets, and more without your phone. 

Enable the Resident Portal - Entratamation skill, then connect your ResidentPortal account to begin.
